externalId.description: External job identifier (e.g. GitHub workflow run ID)

approver.description: Null when status is pending, contains approver details when approved or rejected

post.summary: Acknowledge a job for an agent

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The ID of the job agent

200.description: Successfully retrieved or created the target provider
